ixml.comment:
g011: a small ixml grammar: 011
One of a series (initially for test case construction).
This one is an FSA with 0 nonfinal states, 1 final state, 1 arc.
L is the set containing sequences of zero or more 'a' characters and nothing else.
Revisions: 2021-08-17 : CMSMcQ : correct characterization of language (may have been right once) 2021-01-17 : CMSMcQ : made ixml
